description: Listed only by Irwin, who says: An 8' manual Chorus Reed of the Trumpet species, sounding with less blatancy than the Trumpet Royal, but relatively smooth, for a Trumpet. Both stops are used as solo or ensemble Reeds of great penetration and assertiveness. These names indicate highly academic differences, since the builders interchange names and timbres.
examplesDescription: Trumpet Sonora 16', Pedal; Convention Hall, Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA; Midmer-Losh 1929-32.
